content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What’s your name so I can assist you further?
Thank you, Henry! Could you please provide your address so we can check availability in your area?
Actually, I decided I don’t need plumbing help after all. I’m going to hold off for now.
No problem at all, Henry. If you need plumbing assistance in the future, just let us know. Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Have a great day!
